response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a commodity; it represents a significant investment and a milestone in its field. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a generous offer considering its true worth, which I believe is closer to $1,200,000. I trust this price reflects the value you would place on such an item and provides you with an excellent opportunity to secure it at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
